channel.title: Whats this error

item.title: Whats this error
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Read the errors.

sendOption2 is declared as private within the dialoguehandler class so you cannot reference that method out of that class unless you change it to public.

Check your config class for the IDLE_LOGOUT variable. I for one donâ€™t have an IDLE_LOGOUT.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats this error
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

src\server\rs2\content\RottenPotato.java:31: sendOption2(java.lang.String,java.l ang.String) has private access in server.rs2.content.DialogueHandler c.getDH().sendOption2("Open Bank", "Star stuff"); ^ src\server\rs2\content\RottenPotato.java:92: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IDLE_LOGOUT location: class server.Config Config.IDLE_LOGOUT = false; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

and this is the code.

[code]package game.content;

import game.Client;
import game.Config;

public class RottenPotato {

/**
 * These Methods Call potato Interface
 */

private static void handleRSHD(int gloryId, Client c) {
	c.getDH()
			.sendOption5(
					"Nex kills, Task System, Fishing Comp, T Trek, Debug, Evil Tree",
					"Capes, Smelting, Cutscences, Headgear, Statue",
					"Frem Sagas, NPC info, Photo, LFM, PVP victim",
					"Macro Events", "Normal");
	c.usingGlory = true;
}

private static void handleCommands(int gloryId, Client c) {
	c.getDH().sendOption5("Keep me logged in.", "Kick me out.",
			"Never mind logging, just wipe my bank.", "QP cape please!",
			"QP hood please!");
	c.usingGlory = true;
}

private static void handleExtra(int gloryId, Client c) {
	c.getDH().sendOption2("Open Bank", "Star stuff");
	c.usingGlory = true;
}

/**
 * Method if for Clickitem
 */

public static void Clickitem(Client c, int itemId) {
	if (c.inWild())
		if (c.playerRights <= 1)
			return;
	switch (itemId) {
	case 5733:
		handleRSHD(itemId, c);
		break;
	}

}

/**
 * Method if for Itemclick2
 */
public static void ItemClick2(Client c, int itemId) {
	if (c.inWild())
		if (c.playerRights <= 1)
			return;
	switch (itemId) {
	case 5733:
		handleExtra(itemId, c);
	break;
	}

}

/**
 * Method if for Itemclick3
 */

public static void ItemClick3(Client c, int itemId) {
	if (c.inWild())
		if (c.playerRights <= 1)
			return;
	switch (itemId) {
	case 5733:
		handleCommands(itemId, c);
	break;
	}

}

/**
 * These Method is for clicking text
 */

public static void ClickPotatotext(Client c, int actionButtonId) {
	if (c.inWild())
		if (c.playerRights <= 1)
			return;
	switch (actionButtonId) {
	case 9190:
		Config.IDLE_LOGOUT = false;
		c.sendMessage("Your account has not been kicked.");
		c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
	break;

	case 9191:
		c.logout();
	break;

	case 9192:
		for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) {
			c.bankItems[i] = 0;
			c.bankItemsN[i] = 0;
		}
		c.getItems().resetBank();
		c.getItems().resetItems(5064);
		c.sendMessage("Your bank has been wiped!");
		c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
	break;

	case 9193:
		c.sendMessage("Putting QP cape in your cape slot...");
		c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
		c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] = 9813;
		c.getPA().requestUpdates();
	break;

	case 9194:
		c.sendMessage("Putting QP hood in your hood slot...");
		c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
		c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] = 9814;
		c.getPA().requestUpdates();
	break;

	case 9157:
		c.getPA().openUpBank();
	break;

	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
